name: Inmite
tag_list: mobile, smartphone, iphone, android, blackberry, development, custom, software
overview:
Inmite develops apps for smartphones.

We’ve developed some great apps for iPhone, Android and BlackBerry. Best example of our work is Corkbin - iPhone app which was very succesfull right after the release (see http://corkbin.com).

Our best selling product is News Reader - configurable iPhone app we sell to publishing houses. It allows them give a great way to (not only) read the news to their readers, using a mobile device.

Besides development, we do also a lot of technical talks about mobile development on various conferences, including Google Developer Days.

We work for clients from all parts of the world, including Europe, US or Japan. Our clients are Google CZ, Czech national TV, Ringier and many more…
